ValidationRule.description: If the user enters UK in the Mailing Country field, they must change to United Kingdom
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT( ISCHANGED( LastActivityDate )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Activity_Type__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Date_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Subject_Account__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED( Last_Meeting_Type_Account__c ) )) && OR(BillingCountry = "UK")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter United Kingdom as the country name.
